name: Autotomize
effect: Increase the User's Dexterity by 2. For the rest of scene the User's weight is halved (scale the User's species to 100% and halve the listed weight when relevant) and, while Ferromagnetic Storm Weather is active the User may ignore the effects of Hazards.
description: The Pokemon sheds pieces and starts rotating other parts of its body for easier and lighter movement.
